message:
this MC is kinda retarded, i can't figure him out half the time cause he's all over the place lol. he looks at his sister lustfully and denies it, who cares if yall ain't blood, you were raised as siblings stay that way.
i actually find the sensei more interesting than this guy,
problem is he's too old to date them at 24 yrs old. but that can easily be corrected,
all they'd have to do is raise the characters ages from 16 to 18 and you got something.

i don't get this blonde half the time, i can't figure out her intentions if she's trying to be a rival or just plain stupid lol.
she planned on everyone being here, but nothing happened. if she's trying to get him, she's a very poor excuse for a rival. when the true rivals are Yuuhi and Minato, you can tell. still there's other times it looks like she's trying to play matchmaker,
that's the problem with this blonde, there giving so many mixed signals.
